title.en: Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet - The Official Anthology

altTitles.en: Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet Koushiki Anthology Comic
寄宿学校のジュリエット　公式アンソロジーコミック

description.en:
The official Boarding School Juliet Anthology.  
  
(continuing from Author/Artist: [Umino Mokuzu](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Umino%20Mokuzu), [Ohara Hiroki](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Ohara%20Hiroki), [Koppori Nama Beer](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Koppori%20Nama%20Beer), [Shimetta Seiya](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Shimetta%20Seiya), [Takeshima Eku](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Takeshima%20Eku), [namo](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=namo), [Puyo](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Puyo), [zinbei](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=zinbei), [Norio Tsukudani](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Tsukudani%20Norio), [rin](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=rin), [Tiv](https://mangadex.org/search?artist=Tiv))
